history.proof: intros x. hecrush use: pred_addZ_r, add_OZ, addZ_eq4.

exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce neg to an evaluable reference.
In environment z1 : Z -> Z -> Z z0 : nat -> Z z : Z -> Z Unable to unify "z OZ" with "z1 OZ (z0 0)".

original: intros x. unfold addZ, neg, predZ. destruct x; reflexivity.
